experience.description:
• Product management and operations •
- Launching with Product team and tech teams AliExpress logistics from seller's warehouse (FBS).
- Launching with AliExpress logistics from seller's warehouse with courier pick-up (FBS pick-up).
- Launching with Product team and tech teams AliExpress logistics from AliExpress warehouse (FBA).
- Gathering sellers experience and improvement of logistics methods.
- Product team tasks prioritization and test conductions with focus seller groups.
- Logistics quality metrics tracking, analysis and product improvement. Instruments: Tableau / Deepinsight / Grafana
- Creating joint business models with main logistics AliExpress partners (3PL).
- Automation of logistics seller requests with internal CRM.
- Automation of 3PL requests with Jira.

• Call-center management •
- Leading call-center, call scripts creation, calls analysis, improvement of interaction with sellers.

• Seller support agents management •
- Coordination of AliExpress logistics seller support.
- Leading logistics Jira ticket system, controlling the volume and issues quality.
- Preparation of logistics educational material for sellers and support agents.

• Seller supporting •
- Individual key account sellers expert support, solving complex issues.

- Attracting companies to marketplaces: AliExpress, OZON, Wildberries, Yandex.Market, SberMegaMarket.
- Choosing the optimal development strategy for each company.
- Company onboarding with main parts of:
• legal
• helping with products certification
• content and product card design
• helping with API - integration
• choosing of logistics methods
• creating marketing activities
• determining pricing
• setting up payment system within each platform
- Working with B2B resources and large amounts of data.
- Solving complex technical issues on each marketplace

Attracted and onboarded more than 40 companies from different kind of business categories.

industries.name: Marketing, Advertising, Designer, Event and PR Agencies

experience.description:
- Conducting advertising campaigns in Yandex.Direct and Google.Adwords.
- Analysis of advertising and website data using Google.Analytics, Yandex. Metrica.
- Formation and implementation of recommendations for improving efficiency.
- Preparation of Excel reports, pivot tables, optimization of advertising campaigns.
